name: MINORITY CANNABIS BUSINESS ASSOCIATION (MCBA)
description: MCBA is a not for profit business created to increase diversity in the cannabis industry.
sampleDescriptions: Our mission is to create equal access and economic empowerment for cannabis businesses, their patients, and the communities most affected by the war on drugs.
